name: Dark Tower (Markt & Technik)
overview: Dark Tower is a simple role-playing game in the German language developed by Robert Valentiner and published in 64'er Sonderheft 1985/03. Dark Tower or Dark Tower: Adventures in Three Rivers is a German-language adventure with the task of freeing the scenically so beautiful Dreistromland from the reign of terror of evil and thus redeeming the downtrodden population.
